headline: Device recall for Sedecal SP-HF 4.0 Portable X‑Ray System – no evidence of Medicare/Medicaid fraud
key_facts: Sedecal SP-HF 4.0 Portable X‑Ray System was recalled for non‑compliance with U.S. performance standards
Recall reason involved source‑skin distance and labeling issues
No mention of Medicare, Medicaid, or other federal program billing

original_row.text:
SOURCE: FDA Device Recalls

PRODUCT: Sedecal SP-HF 4.0 Portable X-Ray System; Manufactured by SEDECAL, C/Pelya 9 Pol. Ind. Rio De Janeiro, 28110 Algete (Madrid) Spain
RECALL REASON: A minimum source-skin-distance of less than 30 cm and not identifying the tube manufacturer on the tube housing label resulted in the SP-HF-4.0 Portable Systems not complying with the U.S. Federal performance standard.
CLASSIFICATION: 
STATUS: Terminated
RECALLING FIRM: Sedecal USA, Inc
RECALL DATE:

headline: Device recall for non‑sterile wound dressings – no evidence of federal program fraud
key_facts: Product: Aquasorb Border Hydrogel Wound Dressing
Recall reason: failed to meet sterility specifications
Manufacturer: DeRoyal Wound Care, Powell, TN

original_row.text:
SOURCE: FDA Device Recalls

PRODUCT: Aquasorb  Border, Hydrogel Wound Dressing with Polyurethane Film Border, 25 individual packets per case, Catalog # 46-511, 2.5' x 2.5', labeled in part ***Sterile***Manufacturer:  DeRoyal   200 Debusk Lane  Powell, TN  37849 USA***
RECALL REASON: Wound dressing failed to meet sterility specifications.
CLASSIFICATION: 
STATUS: Terminated
RECALLING FIRM: DeRoyal Wound Care
RECALL DATE:
